meta.name: domain-name-brainstormer
meta.title: Domain Name Brainstormer
meta.description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.

original_definition.skill_description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.

actions.name: Analyze Project Context
actions.description: Understand what user is building, target audience, and key features

actions.name: Extract Keywords
actions.description: Identify relevant keywords, themes, and naming patterns from project context

actions.name: Generate Domain Candidates
actions.description: Create creative, memorable domain name options using keywords and naming best practices

actions.name: Check Domain Availability
actions.description: Verify domain availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app, .co, .xyz)

actions.name: Categorize Results
actions.description: Organize domains into available (.com), alternative TLDs, and premium/taken categories

actions.name: Provide Branding Insights
actions.description: Explain why certain names work well, including memorability, brandability, and pronunciation

actions.name: Rank and Recommend
actions.description: Provide top pick and runner-up recommendations with reasoning

actions.name: Output Formatted Results
actions.description: Present results with emojis, categorization, pricing context, and next steps

rules.name: Validate No Hyphens
rules.condition_expression: Domain contains no hyphens for verbal shareability

directives.name: Domain Names Generated
directives.description: Creative domain options with availability status and recommendations

directives.name: Good Domain Criteria
directives.description: Short (<15 chars), memorable, pronounceable, descriptive, brandable, no hyphens

directives.name: Pricing Context
directives.description: Standard: $10-15/year, Premium TLDs (.io, .ai): $30-50/year, Taken domains: market price

directives.name: Act Fast Principle
directives.description: Good domains get taken quickly; encourage immediate registration of favorites

directives.name: Brand Protection Strategy
directives.description: Recommend registering multiple TLD variations to protect brand

execution_paths.expected_outcome: Categorized domain suggestions with availability and recommendations

execution_paths.condition: User provides specific domain names to check
